titles.title: A bill to bolster the domestic workforce by encouraging communication between career and technical education institutions and emphasizing potential employment opportunities, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain costs relating to career and technical education as qualified higher education expenses for purposes of section 529 programs, and for other purposes.
Generating Real Opportunities for Workforce Training and Hiring Act
Generating Real Opportunities for Workforce Training and Hiring Act
GROWTH Act
GROWTH Act
Generating Real Opportunities for Workforce Training and Hiring Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
